Package swd.team11.coviddatabase.user

Class Client

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
swd.team11.coviddatabase.user.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Client extends Thread
Object for representing a local Client connection with a DataBaseServers. Handles server to application interactions.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(InetAddress address, int port)
      Object for handling a local users connection to the database server.
      Parameters:
      address - server address
      port - server port

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Called when client thread started, attempts to connect to server and if it succeeds, it will announce the connect event to all listeners.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • connect

      public void connect() throws IOException
      Method for attempting connection based on credentials stored in client object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If unable to connect

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect() throws IOException
      Method for disconnecting client from server. Should be called when client closes application
      Throws:
      IOException - Unsuccessful attempt at reaching server

    • addConnectListener

      public void addConnectListener(ConnectEvent e)
      Add a ConnectEvent listener that will be called when this client successfully connects to the server.
      Parameters:
      e - event object listener
      See Also:
      • ConnectEvent

    • announceConnectEvent

      private void announceConnectEvent()
      Announces to all listeners that client has connected, passes the Client object that has connected to the listener event.
      See Also:
      • ConnectEvent

    • sendPacket

      public void sendPacket(Packet packet) throws IOException
      Sends packet to the server
      Parameters:
      packet - Packet to send
      Throws:
      IOException - If unable to get connection with server

    • awaitPacket

      public Packet awaitPacket() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Await a packet being sent from server. Called when you are expecting data to be returned
      Returns:
      The packet received from the server
      Throws:
      IOException - Unable to connect to server
      ClassNotFoundException - If the object returned by server is not a Packet

    • requestData

      public Packet requestData(String request) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Request data from server, designed specifically to simplify sending request packet types to the server, where a response is always expected thus the method automatically awaits response after sending request.
      Parameters:
      request - Request message to send to server
      Returns:
      Packet returned from server
      Throws:
      IOException - Unable to establish connection with server
      ClassNotFoundException - Object returned by server is not Packet
